MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G76 postcode area of Glasgow. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to further investigation required on site, and we now expect your supply to be restored by 4.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:19am on Wednesday, 03 February 2021
